body.name: Lush Decor Insulated Grommet Blackout Window Curtain Panels, Pair, 52" W x 84" L, Light Gray - Classic Modern Design - Chic Window Decor - Long Curtains For Living Room, Bedroom, Or Dining Room
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: Classic Design: The Lush Decor Insulated Grommet Blackout Window Panel Set has a classic solid colored design and effectively blocks out almost all sunlight. They are great for all ages and easily complement any room, adding a touch of style to your home.

Blackout Curtains: Besides blocking out almost all natural light, these insulated blackout curtains are designed to also help reduce external noise and keep room temperatures stable. They also provide privacy, and ensure a peaceful sleep, day or night.

Chic Window Decor: These long curtains measure 52 inches wide by 84 inches long and are crafted from microfiber. This set boasts exceptional quality and a sleek design, all without the need for a lining. This set includes 2 blackout window panels.

Easy To Install: Each blackout Panel comes with metal grommets measuring 1.65 inches in diameter, allowing for easy installation with a curtain rod. Decorate your bedroom, living room, dining room, or nursery with these gray curtains.
Easy Care: These curtains are safe to machine wash cold on the gentle cycle, and can be hung to dry, offering a convenient and cost-effective solution for maintaining their pristine condition.

About Us: Lush Decor crafts beautiful home decor for every room, style and age. Our luxury-for-less styles are designed to inspire. From timeless neutrals, rich textures and vibrant colors, we help you dress your space to reflect your personal style.
Lush Decor: Woman Founded, Women Led Brand
body.description: If you like to keep your home cool and rest during the day, these Lush Decor Insulated Grommet Blackout Window Curtain Panels are perfect for you. Embrace a simple elegance in your home with the Lush Decor Insulated Grommet Blackout Window Curtain Panel Set. The solid colors will easily complement your existing decor with a glamorous touch. Blackout window panels are energy efficient and will effectively regulate your room's temperature, help reduce outside noise and ensure privacy. These curtains block out almost all natural light, boast exceptional quality and a sleek design, all without the need for a lining. Decorate your bedroom, living room, dining room, or nursery with these chic insulated curtains. Simply hang these panels by sliding a curtain rod through the 1.65 inch metal grommets located at the top of each panel. Each panel measures 52 inches across, giving you 104 inches of total width, and are available in multiple lengths. These curtains are safe to machine wash on gentle cycle and it's recommended you hang them to dry. Please refer to label for care instructions.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Lush Décor is a brand of Triangle Home Fashions. From its creation, Triangle Home Fashions has focused on three core values: design, quality and innovation. Since that time, it has grown and evolved into a home textiles company that values and nurtures its relationships with its customers. We are challenged every day is to design and develop the best in home textiles, offering unique fabrics with incredible detailed surface treatments so our customers always feel that what they are buying is on trend, long lasting and most importantly a great value.

Easy to Hang: Grommets (1.6” in diameter) make it easy to hang – just slip the rod through and you’re done! They drape beautifully and add a finishing touch to every décor. A custom-made look with ready-made ease. Décor Enhancing: Available in nine luscious fashion colors and a variety of lengths up to 120” to fit a range of window sizes. Solids and Fashion prints are available. Absolute Block Out Curtains work even in our lighter fashion colors of light gray, wheat and yellow. These curtains enhance any décor- contemporary as well as traditional. Farmhouse, too. Triple fusion technology: This energy efficient fabric completely blocks any light, reduces outside noise and helps regulate the temperature in your room. Keep your room cooler in the summer and warmer in the winter. Soft to the touch.

Lush Decor Curtains-Grommet Panel with with Insulated Blackout Lining, Room Darkening Window Set Insulated Black Out Grommeted Window Curtains from Lush Décor combine fashion with function. The pair of curtain panels, perfect for every room in your home, block out 99% of the light, regulate the temperature in your room and help reduce outside noise.

Features: Easy Care and Durable: safe to Machine Wash Cold, Mesh Bag, Similar Colors, Gentle Cycle, Non-Chlorine Bleach. Do Not Wring. Hang to Dry. For Night-Time Sleeping: Experience a deeper more restful sleep. Wake up refreshed and ready to start your day! For Day-Time Sleeping: Block out the light and noise of the day, and fall asleep more quickly Use it in your kids’ bedroom: Naptime? No problem, these curtain panels block out daylight and help reduce noise so your children will rest well. Use it in your den/ living room: Watch your favorite movie/ TV show, without that annoying glare. They act as insulation and keep your room comfortable at all temperatures.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great quality, and they look beautiful at an affordable price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Heavy Quality material is beautiful. Gray
reviews.reviewText: I got the 120 inch, but I do not believe they’re quite 120. I would definitely measure them when you get them in. However, they fit my new sliding doors perfectly, and look fantastic. The price point is amazing. There is no sunlight coming through and hitting my walls - (they are not sheer) I bought them specifically, so I would not get sun damage on a painting. Note…at the same time, they are not a “complete” blackout. I mention this, as some people need complete darkness to sleep, such as through the morning, or if they’re night workers, etc. - if you need complete blackout these probably would not be the best for you. However, they’re perfect for darkening enough for me, creating privacy and they are amazingly elegant, and have transformed my master into a beautiful, regal place. I hope this helps in making a choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The price, the texture & quality is great! Easy to iron to get the packaging wrinkles off. I’m loving the length too. I opt for length of 95” instead of the regular 84”. Glad I did. Planning on buying more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Value for money
reviews.reviewText: I needed an update for my living space and getting custom curtains was just out of the question. These were perfect for my high ceilings for the price. They are not blackout curtains but they are certainly heavily light filtering and don’t allow much to pass through. They look very clean and put together for my space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Affordable, beautiful, draping, and offers noise reduction
reviews.reviewText: I like this because it is very affordable. The fabric is heavy enough and lovely in terms of how it drapes. It is machine, washable, and durable. It’s water resistant and stain resistant. It doesn’t seem to catch pet hair. And it offers a lovely solution to an overly bright room, as well as offers a good amount of noise reduction. I use it as a curtain for a doorway, and I was able to use multiple curtains to create a very, pretty non-tacky doorway, and it really is effective in terms of blocking sounds from downstairs. It also completely blocks out the light. Oh, it also is light weight and, I have gotten so many sets of the specific curtain that I’ve used them all over the house and I just think for the price and the beauty of this product I’m going to be adding it to the downstairs

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I shopped around for the perfect curtains and happened to stumble across these beauties. I almost didn’t buy because of a few mixed reviews and I’m not a huge fan of grommets and wanted a high end feel. These beauties are perfect. I’m glad I took a chance. I have 9ft ceilings and I went with the 120” length. I had them hung two inches below the molding and they still delivered on the puddle length I was aiming to achieve. For the price point, these are amazing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These curtains are very pretty and darken the room nicely. Beware they are sparkly ( I didn’t see that in picture of them ) I love them though, but if you don’t like sparkling, these curtains are not for you .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice but they wrinkle
reviews.reviewText: Nice product. I do have to iron them after washing due to wrinkles that do not come off from the dryer or even a steamer.
I found the shade of gray to have cool undertones (blue). They didn’t work with my warm paint tones. Nice curtains, but returned.
Me encanta. la calidad y material es excelente.

Se trata de una cortina adecuada tanto en material como textura. Con una aceptable relación calidad precio. El color es agradable. Material fácil de lavar. No obstante, advertir que su opacidad es relativa, deja pasar luz, y por ello, su aislamiento es mejorable. Pero aceptable por el precio.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great curtain.Good valueLooks really niceAs good as curtains with a much higher price
